text:
@wizkidayo I don't know why people are insulting Wizkid. Some Pastors have previously made a point that they can heal the sick, make the blind see, the cripple walk, the dumb speak. Why is the COVID-19 any different.

Maybe because this one is not staged or rehearsed 🤷
